detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a chest pocket with a button.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. One patterned pair.

Calf-length dress in a lightweight viscose weave with a collar, V-shaped opening at the top and buttons down the front. Cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, concealed elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a detachable shoulder strap, two compartments with a zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Recycled polyester lining. Length 21 cm. Height 14 cm.
Suede ankle boots with open toes, decorative gathers at the front, a zip in one side and slim, covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 8.5 cm.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in tie belt at the waist and long balloon sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Boxy-style hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Small backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Outer compartment with a hook and loop fastening and a padded back plate and base. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline. Cuffed sleeves and a sweatshirt fabric trim at the hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.

Sleeveless tulle dress with a double-layered skirt. Round neck with a small opening and covered button at the back of the neck, and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
V-neck top in stretch crêpe jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie at the side and short sleeves with elasticated ends.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave made from a cotton blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front, ribbed cuffs and a flounce at the hem.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Two-button jacket in a slub-weave linen and wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Playsuit in soft velour with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip at the top and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back with a safety button at the top. Seam at the waist and a slightly stretchy skirt with a slit at the back. Lined.
One-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with one narrow shoulder strap and one short sleeve. The shoulder strap has a decorative bow at the front.
Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with a button.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorter, fitted jumper in a rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Triangle bikini top with lined cups, laser-cut, scalloped edges and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can also be fastened across the back. Wide elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with seams at the back of the knees and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Cold shoulder dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, elasticated sleeves with a small frill trim at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Padded gilet in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a round tab and chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and a zip at the top. Unlined.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a gathered yoke at the back and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gently slanted shoulders with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in soft, patterned twill with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling. Unlined, drawstring hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the hem.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam and flounce at the hem.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.

Long dress in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Gathers at the shoulders and draping at the front with a deep V-neck. Lace lining at the front and a lace-covered back with an opening. Concealed zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Small frill with overlocked edges at the shoulders and waist. Lined skirt.
Shorts in a crinkled weave with a high, elasticated waist, lace trims down the front, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy denim with worn details, a regular waist and zip fly.
Top in soft pile with a ribbed, high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Coat in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Shoulder tabs and decorative gathers at the shoulder seam, a tie belt at the waist and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length skirt in a cotton weave with pleats at the top and pockets in the side seams. Elasticated waist with a small frill trim and tie belt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Metal earrings with pearly plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans with a high, asymmetric waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut, slightly wider legs with raw-edge frayed hems.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel and concealed key pocket.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-shaped opening and buttons at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Dress knitted in a soft, textured cotton blend with buttons on one shoulder and short raglan sleeves.
Ankle boots in imitation suede. Faux fur linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) soles.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Inset ladder stitching at the top and waist, and long, trumpet sleeves with ladder stitched bands and ties at the cuffs. Lined skirt.

Car coat in a water-repellent weave with a slight sheen. Funnel collar, a concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Welt side pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
High-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket at the front, back pockets and flared legs.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with embroidered text, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Brushed inside.
Top in slub jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Jumper in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed stand-up collar, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.

Long blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
